About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Mission-driven full stack developer with a passion for thoughtful UI design, collaboration, and teaching. Over 5 years commercial experience producing fast, intuitive, dynamic and responsive User Interfaces and Web Applications.

Client: All Vending Stores

Project: Melbourne City Food Trucks

Melbourne City Food Trucks is a web platform that allows food truck operators in Melbourne to connect with the public. Using the platform food trucks can inform the public about their current and future locations. And the offerings of the day. The public uses the platform to determine what is available and locations of the food trucks.

Client: BAE Systems

Project: System Test Simulator

User Interface and platform for running behavioural models of components for a defence application. Features include: 3D visualization capability and test automation capability. BAE Systems uses this system to validate engineering components and deliver stunning presentations to the customers.

Client: Sealite/Avlite

Project: Solar Calculator

Solar Calculator is a web platform used by Sealite/Avlite to perform engineering design calculations based on data from NASA. Using this tool, a non technical person or the customer can translate a set of requirements to a working system design for Marine and Aviation applications. Sealite/Avlite uses this tool to rapidly generate proposals and cost estimates for the customer.
